name: Roserade
author: Takashi Yamaguchi
flavor_text: Its sweet aroma attracts prey. Then it spews poison. The more toxic it is, the sweeter its aroma.

poke_power.name: Energy Signal
poke_power.effect: When you attach a {G} Energy card or {P} Energy card from your hand to Roserade during your turn, you may use this power. If you attach a {G} Energy card, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused. If you attach a {P} Energy card, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. This power can’t be used if Roserade is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Power Blow
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to Roserade.
